alert.note: Alert for McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 5:39PM CST until December 18 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, McDonald. * WHEN...Until 530 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along the Big Sugar Creek basin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 537 PM CST, Trained weather spotters reported flooding in the advisory area. Rises along the Big Sugar Creek basin are expected through this evening a water moves northwest out of Arkansas. - This includes the following low water crossings... Big Sugar Creek at Buzzard Glory Road, Little Sugar Creek at Skaggs Hollow Road and Bentonville Hollow at Highway E. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pineville and Powell.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
